divs: Sighting DetailsI saw (witness) 3 ufo's about 10,000 ft at around 2pm, They were all 3 one on top of the other, maybe 800 to 1000 feet apart. Bright like an intense beam of light, like a Halogen lamp. The lowest one made a quick right turn and flew into a cloud. The next one up, moved down to the first ones position and then made a quick right turn and followed the first into the same cloud. The 3rd light moved down a bit slower (still very fast) and had a trail of light behind, until it moved into the position of the last light. Then it moved into the cloud (quick right) and dissappeared into it. About 2 minutes later, the cloud(the only cloud in the sky) dissappeared, and there was nothing.It was the only cloud in the sky also.....it was a beautiful and clear day! Later that night I was looking in the sky after my curiosity had a hold of me, and observed the moon and a small round throbing and pulsating light near by the moon. I did take videos of this light and have those videos now. I didn't think about it until now, hoping to get some answers. I am an X US Navy veteran, and I know what I see to be a fact. I and have a pretty good knowledge of many type's of aircraft. I have also worked very close to aircraft carriers in the Pacific Ocean. I have these videos and would like to share them with someone who would be interested and helpful in telling me what it was that I saw! PLEASE contact me and give me a report! Thank you, Stephen McCandless Veteran of Foreigh Wars (Viet Nam) PS. I did make a report of the first lights after they happened......I cannot remember the exact date
Summary: After seeing 3 ufo's (no photo) at about 2pm.....later that night about 9pm
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Freeley
There were 2 other sightings in Freeley on or around July 12th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
